Description:
Detects change the the "AutodialDLL" key which could be used as a persistence method to load custom DLL via the "ws2_32" library

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Persistence Via AutodialDLL
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\services\winsock2\parameters\autodialdll%'
